Antharas Watchman Theodric:
Portal Stone is needed to get Into the Antaras Lair.
They say that this stone is in the Order of the Knights of Baltus The Portal Stone is guilty of the skin character At the same time, you need to be ready that it will take some time to enter. If you really want to fight Antaras, go to Felo and do his job. For your help, Felo will tell you how to get the stone.
